etymologies: late 18th century (earlier as chirurgical): from French cirurgical, from Old French sirurgie (see surgery)

definitions: relating to or used in surgery
shortDefinitions: relating to or used in surgery

definitions: (of a special garment or appliance) worn to correct or relieve an injury, illness, or deformity
shortDefinitions: (of special garment or appliance) worn to correct or relieve injury or deformity

definitions: denoting something done with great precision, especially a swift and highly accurate military attack from the air
